0.text:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns  6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:
One beside  Baron Nashor's pit
One beside  Dragon's pit
One near each of the camps for  Blue Sentinel and  Red Brambleback
0.html:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns 6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:

  • One beside Baron Nashor's pit
  • One beside Dragon's pit
  • One near each of the camps for Blue Sentinel and Red Brambleback
markedPassages: Baron Nashor's
Dragon's
Blue Sentinel
Red Brambleback

1.text: After  minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by  champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
1.html: After minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
markedPassages: minions
champions

2.text: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants  sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. Crystal Spires grant  30 split among its captors, or  15 for a single captor.
2.html: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. Crystal Spires grant 30 split among its captors, or 15 for a single captor.
markedPassages: sight
30
15

3.text: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering  Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with  Impale.
3.html: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Impale.
markedPassages: Crystal Venom
Impale

4.text: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains  70 − 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed and  43% − 160% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
4.html: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains  70 − 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed and  43% − 160% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 70 − 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed
43% − 160% (based on level) bonus attack speed
1% maximum mana

5.text: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.
5.html: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.

0.text: Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. If at least one enemy is hit, he becomes charged for 5 seconds, empowering subsequent casts of Crystal Slash to deal bonus magic damage.
0.html: Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. If at least one enemy is hit, he becomes charged for 5 seconds, empowering subsequent casts of Crystal Slash to deal bonus magic damage.

1.content: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% of target's maximum health (+ 20% AD) (+ 30% AP)

1.text: Each instance of damage is capped at 200 against epic  monsters.
1.html: Each instance of damage is capped at 200 against epic monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

2.text: Basic attacks reduce Crystal Slash's  current cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against  champions.
2.html: Basic attacks reduce Crystal Slash's  current cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against champions.
markedPassages: current cooldown
champions

0.text: Active: Skarner grants himself a  shield for up to 6 seconds, and while it holds, he gains  bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Skarner grants himself a shield for up to 6 seconds, and while it holds, he gains  bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.
markedPassages: shield
bonus movement speed

0.text: Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with  Impale, Fracture's  current cooldown is reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
0.html: Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with Impale, Fracture's  current cooldown is reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
markedPassages: Impale
current cooldown

1.text: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit,  slows them for 2.5 seconds, and marks them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
1.html: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, slows them for 2.5 seconds, and marks them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

2.text: Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark to deal bonus physical damage and  stun them for 1.25 seconds.
2.html: Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark to deal bonus physical damage and stun them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: stun

0.text:
Active: Skarner  roots the target enemy  champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage plus magic damage and  suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.
Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
0.html:
Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage plus magic damage and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.

Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.
markedPassages: roots
champion
suppresses
revealed

1.text: Impale's drag ignores  displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast  Fracture, or use  Flash during Impale.
1.html: Impale's drag ignores displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast Fracture, or use Flash during Impale.
markedPassages: displacement immunity
Fracture
Flash
possibleConcerningAbilities: Impale's drag ignores  displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast  Fracture, or use  Flash during Impale.

textContent.html:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns 6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:

  • One beside Baron Nashor's pit
  • One beside Dragon's pit
  • One near each of the camps for Blue Sentinel and Red Brambleback

textContent.text: After  minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by  champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
textContent.html: After minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

textContent.text: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants  sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. Crystal Spires grant  30 split among its captors, or  15 for a single captor.
textContent.html: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. Crystal Spires grant 30 split among its captors, or 15 for a single captor.

textContent.text: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering  Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with  Impale.
textContent.html: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Impale.

textContent.text: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains  70 − 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed and  43% − 160% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains  70 − 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed and  43% − 160% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.

Stats

+35 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+30% attack speed
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks expire by one every 0.5 seconds when the duration ends.
Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3 bonus attack damage, 3 ability haste, and 3 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THREEFOLD STRIKE: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks expire by one every 0.5 seconds when the duration ends.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.

Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
